name: multi_turn_10
requirements: Execute ONLY the explicitly requested state modifications. Use exact values as specified: numbers as integers/floats (not strings), strings in quotes. For stats dict, use ONLY the key names from the Variable description - never invent new keys. When setting boolean-like values, use integers (1 for true, 0 for false) unless explicitly told otherwise. Do not add unrequested keys or modify unrequested variables.

turns.query: Starting a new startup called 'TechVenture' with status 'idea' at level 1. Set active to true, score to 0. Add 'founded' to history. Initialize stats with founders: 2 and funding: 0.
We built our MVP! Set status to 'prototype', increase level by 1, add 10 to score. Append 'mvp_built' to history. Add users: 10 to stats, keep existing stats.
Raised seed funding! Set status to 'seed', increase level by 1, add 40 to score. Append 'seed_raised' to history. Set funding to 500000, multiply users by 10, add employees: 5, keep founders.
Launching beta! Set status to 'beta', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'beta_launch' to history. Multiply users by 10, double employees, keep founders and funding.
Public launch! Set status to 'launched', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'public_launch' to history. Multiply users by 10, double employees, keep founders and funding.
Raised Series A! Set status to 'series_a', increase level by 1, add 300 to score. Append 'series_a' to history. Multiply funding by 10, multiply users by 5, set employees to 50, keep founders.
Scaling globally! Set status to 'scaling', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'expansion' to history. Multiply users by 4, triple employees, add countries: 5, keep founders and funding.

Raised Series B! Set status to 'series_b', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'series_b' to history. Multiply funding by 5, add 300000 more users, double employees, double countries, keep founders.

Filing for IPO! Append ' Inc.' to name. Set status to 'pre_ipo', increase level by 1, add 3000 to score. Append 'ipo_filing' to history. Double users, add 200 more employees, double countries, add valuation: 500000000, keep founders and funding.

IPO complete! Append ' [PUBLIC]' to name. Set status to 'public', increase level by 1, double the score. Append 'ipo_complete' to history. Double users, double employees, add 10 more countries, double valuation, add ticker: 'TVTR', keep founders and funding.
New student Jordan enrolled! Set name to 'Jordan', status to 'enrolled', level to 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'enrolled' to history. Initialize stats with credits: 0 and gpa: 0.0.
Classes started! Set status to 'freshman', add 15 to score. Append 'classes_started' to history. Add 15 credits, add courses: 5, keep gpa.
Midterms passed! Keep status and level. Add 30 to score. Append 'midterms_passed' to history. Set gpa to 3.2, add exams: 5, keep credits and courses.
Finals passed! Keep status and level. Double the score. Append 'finals_passed' to history. Double credits, increase gpa by 0.2, double exams, keep courses.
Year 2 begins! Set status to 'sophomore', increase level by 1, add 10 to score. Append 'year_2_started' to history. Double courses, keep credits, gpa, exams.
Declared major! Keep status and level. Add 50 to score. Append 'declared_major' to history. Add 15 credits, increase gpa by 0.1, add 5 more courses, add 5 more exams, add major: 'CS'.
Completed internship! Set status to 'junior', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'internship' to history. Add 15 credits, increase gpa by 0.1, add 5 courses, add 5 exams, keep major.

Research project published! Keep status and level. Add 50 to score. Append 'research_project' to history. Add 15 credits, increase gpa by 0.1, add 5 courses, add 5 exams, add publications: 1, keep major.

Thesis submitted! Set status to 'senior', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'thesis_submitted' to history. Add 15 credits, increase gpa by 0.1, add 5 courses, add 5 exams, keep major and publications.

Graduation day! Append ' [GRADUATE]' to name. Set status to 'graduated', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Set active to false. Append 'graduated' to history. Add 30 credits, increase gpa by 0.1, add 10 courses, add 10 exams, add honors: 'magna_cum_laude', keep major and publications.
Starting new game as 'Hero' with status 'tutorial' at level 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'game_started' to history. Initialize stats with hp: 100, mp: 50, gold: 0.
Tutorial complete! Set status to 'act_1', add 4 levels, add 500 to score. Append 'tutorial_complete' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 100 gold, add weapons: 1.
First boss defeated! Keep status. Add 5 levels, add 1000 to score. Append 'boss_1_defeated' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 400 gold, add 1 weapon, add bosses: 1.
Entering Act 2! Set status to 'act_2', add 5 levels, double the score. Append 'act_2_started' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, double gold, add 1 weapon, keep bosses.
Second boss defeated! Keep status. Add 5 levels, add 2000 to score. Append 'boss_2_defeated' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, double gold, add 1 weapon, add 1 boss.
Entering Act 3! Set status to 'act_3', add 5 levels, add 2500 to score. Append 'act_3_started' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 1500 gold, add 1 weapon, keep bosses.
Third boss defeated! Keep status. Add 5 levels, add 2500 to score. Append 'boss_3_defeated' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 1500 gold, add 1 weapon, add 1 boss.
Entering final dungeon! Set status to 'finale', add 5 levels, add 5000 to score. Append 'final_dungeon' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 2500 gold, add 1 weapon, keep bosses.

Final boss defeated! Append ' [CHAMPION]' to name. Set status to 'victory', add 5 levels, add 10000 to score. Append 'final_boss_defeated' to history. Add 50 hp, add 25 mp, add 2500 gold, add 1 weapon, add 1 boss.

100% completion achieved! Replace '[CHAMPION]' with '[LEGEND]' in name. Set status to 'postgame', add 10 levels, double the score. Set active to false. Append '100_percent' to history. Set hp to 999, mp to 999, gold to 99999, add 2 weapons, add 6 bosses, add secrets: 50.
Starting marathon training as 'Alex' with status 'beginner' at level 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'started_training' to history. Initialize stats with weight: 180, miles: 0, sessions: 0.
Completed first run! Keep status and level. Add 10 to score. Append 'first_run' to history. Subtract 1 from weight, set miles to 2, set sessions to 1.
Week 1 complete! Set status to 'novice', increase level by 1, add 20 to score. Append 'week_1_complete' to history. Subtract 2 from weight, set miles to 10, set sessions to 5.
First 5K race! Keep status and level. Add 30 to score. Append 'first_5k' to history. Subtract 2 from weight, set miles to 25, set sessions to 12, add personal_best: 32.

Month 1 complete! Set status to 'intermediate', increase level by 1, add 40 to score. Append 'month_1_complete' to history. Subtract 3 from weight, set miles to 50, set sessions to 20, set personal_best to 28.
First 10K race! Keep status and level. Add 50 to score. Append 'first_10k' to history. Subtract 2 from weight, set miles to 80, set sessions to 30, set personal_best to 25, add races: 1.

Half marathon complete! Set status to 'advanced', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'half_marathon' to history. Subtract 2 from weight, set miles to 150, set sessions to 50, set personal_best to 23, set races to 3.
Peak training phase! Keep status and level. Add 100 to score. Append 'peak_training' to history. Subtract 3 from weight, set miles to 250, set sessions to 80, set personal_best to 21, set races to 5.

Marathon day! Set status to 'elite', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'marathon_day' to history. Keep weight, add 26 miles, add 1 session, keep personal_best, add 1 race, add marathon_time: 240.

Goal achieved! Append ' [MARATHONER]' to name. Set status to 'champion', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Set active to false. Append 'goal_achieved' to history. Keep weight, set miles to 300, set sessions to 90, set personal_best to 20, set races to 8, set marathon_time to 225, add medals: 3.
Starting new project 'TaskFlow' with status 'planning' at level 1. Set score to 0, active to true. Add 'project_created' to history. Initialize stats with commits: 0, tests: 0, features: 0.
Repo initialized! Set status to 'development', increase level by 1, add 20 to score. Append 'repo_initialized' to history. Set commits to 5, keep tests, set features to 1, add contributors: 1.
Tests added! Keep status and level. Add 30 to score. Append 'tests_added' to history. Set commits to 15, set tests to 20, set features to 3, set contributors to 2.

Alpha release! Set status to 'alpha', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'alpha_release' to history. Set commits to 30, set tests to 50, set features to 5, set contributors to 3, add bugs: 10.
Bugs fixed! Keep status and level. Add 50 to score. Append 'bugs_fixed' to history. Set commits to 50, set tests to 80, set features to 7, set contributors to 4, set bugs to 3.

Beta release! Set status to 'beta', increase level by 1, add 50 to score. Append 'beta_release' to history. Set commits to 75, set tests to 120, set features to 10, set contributors to 5, set bugs to 0, add users: 50.

User feedback received! Keep status and level. Add 100 to score. Append 'user_feedback' to history. Set commits to 100, set tests to 150, set features to 15, set contributors to 8, set bugs to 5, set users to 200.

Release candidate ready! Set status to 'release_candidate', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'rc_release' to history. Set commits to 120, set tests to 200, set features to 18, set contributors to 10, set bugs to 0, set users to 500.

Version 1.0 released! Append ' v1.0' to name. Set status to 'released', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Append 'v1_released' to history. Set commits to 150, set tests to 250, set features to 20, set contributors to 12, keep bugs at 0, set users to 1000, add stars: 100.

Stable milestone! Append ' [STABLE]' to name. Set status to 'maintained', increase level by 1, add 100 to score. Set active to false. Append 'stable_milestone' to history. Set commits to 200, set tests to 300, set features to 25, set contributors to 15, keep bugs at 0, set users to 5000, set stars to 500, add forks: 50.
